text:
NEMA (also 1200 South Indiana or One Grant Park and formerly 113 East Roosevelt) is a skyscraper and related development under construction for Chicago, Illinois in the Central Station neighborhood, of the Near South Side community area.
The skyscraper is planned to have 792 apartments and rise. It is designed by Rafael Viñoly as the first of a three phase development that includes an even taller 648-unit structure as the second phase and a 100-unit townhouse development with a public park as the third phase.
